Title: Relates to the allocation of prekindergarten funding to prioritize students eligible for free or reduced-price lunch and multilingual learners
Summary: Relates to the allocation of prekindergarten funding to prioritize students eligible for free or reduced-price lunch and multilingual learners.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to the allocation of prekindergarten funding to prioritize students eligible for free or reduced-price lunch and multilingual learners
